overview_of_class: The course will present fundamental principles of symmetry underlying properties of functional and multifunctional crystalline materials. Principles will be applied to the analysis of their electronic, optical, magnetic and mechanical properties.
name: Selected Topics in the Solid State
title: MEAS MAT_SCI 452-0-20 Selected Topics in the Solid State

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course will present fundamental principles of symmetry underlying properties of functional and multifunctional crystalline materials. Principles will be applied to the analysis of their electronic, optical, magnetic and mechanical properties.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: There will be a mid-term and final exam. A term paper on the symmetry properties of multifunctional materials is required.
